titleStmt.title: A solemn discourse vpon the sacred league and covenant of both kingdomes, opening the divinity and policy of it: / by John Saltmarsh, Master of Arts, and late pastor of Hesterton in Yorkshire.
titleStmt.author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 21. 1643"; the final 4 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
